events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on a busy street causing significant front-end damage.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords related to car collision and vehicle damage.
An insurance agent specialized in auto claims has been assigned to handle the investigation and communication.
Acknowledgement of the claim has been sent to the customer confirming receipt and intent to process quickly.
Request sent to customer for accident photos, police report, and vehicle registration to proceed with verification.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photographs of the vehicle’s damages and police documentation.
An official investigation has begun to assess vehicle damage and confirm the circumstances of the reported accident.
Investigation completed with findings confirming collision impact and estimate of repair costs documented thoroughly.
A settlement offer has been proposed to the customer covering repair costs and additional rental vehicle expenses.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the communication and process.
The claim has been officially approved by the claims department following the customer acceptance of the settlement.
Payment processed and issued to the customer’s account to cover all approved expenses related to the vehicle accident.
The claim case has been officially closed after full settlement and payment were successfully completed.
All documentation and records related to this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
